experience.title: Core Member
experience.description: Looking To Break Into VC?Join the 500+ VC Enthusiast to learn, collaborate, network and craft path to venture capital.At VC Crafters, we aims to help the VC Enthusiast to craft their unique path to venture capital. Join now and be the part of conversation.You will get access to:-All-in-one VC career resources- Weekly Networking Events,-Weekly Sessions By VC Professional- Daily Discussion Session On Various Topics1:1 on-demand sessions with VC Professional- Daily VC job updates- VC/Resume Review & Interview Preparation Help- Exceptional / Active Member - Recommend to VC Firm's RecruitersJoin now:

experience.title: VC
experience.description: Stedu Fund is an early-stage sector agnostic venture fund passionately dedicated to empowering the next generation by providing unwavering support to innovative initiatives that have the potential to drive transformative change in society.If you are raising fund or want to connect with mentors/investors. Feel free to email at: sahil@steduassociation.com.Also check out our stedu lab, We help you go from idea to reality in 8 weeks, for free! We provide you with resources, inspiration, network, feedback, funding and community all for free.Apply Now:

experience.title: Writer

Check out here - Venture Curator:  Daily Digest: audience of 50000+ subscribers, we are open for sponsoring brands in our newsletter and help them to reach highly engaged audience.
